{{letter_head or ''}}

Confirmation Letter


{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.offer_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}


TO,
{{doc.applicant_name or ""}}
{% set address = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "current_address") %} {{address or ""}}


Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ""}}


Congratulations! We are pleased to inform you that following the successful completion of your probationary period, your employment with Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd has been confirmed as of {% set date = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "final_confirmation_date") %} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}


Your hard work, dedication, and commitment during the probation period have not gone unnoticed, and we are confident that you will continue to make valuable contributions to our team. Your position as "{{doc.designation or ""}}"has now been confirmed on a permanent basis under the terms and conditions as outlined in your initial employment agreement.


Once again, congratulations on this achievement. We look forward to your continued success with Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd.


Yours sincerely,





Authorized Signatory.
Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd

Acceptance:

I Swati, accept the above terms and conditions of my appointment as CEO of Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd.


Name Date Signature

{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
